-- Megatron --

Megatron barrel rolls downward avoiding the enemy weaponfire. He 
curves left, and seems to disappear behind a hill a fair distance 
from the fight.

He drops Warhead carelessly on the ground, "You're lucky this time 
minion... I still have use for you so you live." Megatron leaps 
upward into flight, and accelerates back towards the fight, he'd 
taken some damage, and was rather irritated not only at those who'd 
damaged him, but also at the incompetence of his troops (ooC: ^^' ).

Since he was already close, his flight was short, but his damaged 
optics prevented him from attacking at a range, so he closed in on 
two of the Maximals (Hot Rod and Kup). (only Hot Rod if Kup isn't 
near him at all)
